title: Is anyone looking for T206 PSA 7's or 8's?

posts.post_title: Is anyone looking for T206 PSA 7's or 8's?
posts.post_content: I'm thinking of selling some. If you have any wants or needs, please let me know....thanks
Any bright white 50/50 centered and perfectly registered sevens? If so, they're calling my name! :-D
